snippet: Clemson coach Dabo Swinney knows quite well how teams and players get long-term benefits from the extra practices that accompany a bowl bid....
lead_paragraph: Clemson coach Dabo Swinney knows quite well how teams and players get long-term benefits from the extra practices that accompany a bowl bid.

headline.main: Additional Practices Create Balancing Act for Bowl Teams
